entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
